name: Blue Flames & Chains corset
description:
Diy Blue Flames & Chains Corset

             Brand new, hand made. Serged. Beautiful top.

   If you want to make a statement when you go out my corsets are just what your looking for 

This is a great corset for the Biker / emo / Punk / Goth girl

This sexy corset is made of Blue Flames & Solid black  Material

Each panel alternates from flames to solid

Has Grommet tape on the front with big grommets & has a chain hanging from them 

Can be worn with or without the chain totally removeable

This is a must have for the reall rocker girl !!!!

This corset is double layered  inside is solid Blue material 

top & bottom are edged with Black edging

has a sexy,biker, Goth, punk, emo look

laces in the back With Black  grommet tape & satin Blue cord

Measurements are Bust 36" Waist 30"  hips 36"

Will fit  bigger sizes 

cup size Large B to Large C

All seam are serged to prevent fraying

and top stitched to make the corset more durable

**This is a beautiful top **

Pictures do no justice

Care Instructions 

***Recommend HAND wash hang dry***

Can be machine washed  cold 

any other questions feel free to contact me

thanks for looking!!

name: Candy Cane corset
description:
Diy Red & White 

Polka dots & ruffle Lolita style top

Brand new, hand made. Serged. Beautiful top.

If you want to make a statement when you go out my corsets are just what your looking for 

This is a great corset for the Lolita style

This sexy corset is made From Red & Polka Dots With a cute Ruffle

down each pannel that has polka dots & 4 solid red pannels

& has a sliky white stripe sewn down each seam

This is a must have for the Lolita Girl !!!!

This corset is not boned but with the sily white srtipes sewn on each seam it might as well be boned

These make it stiffer & more durable

The top & bottom are edged in white edging & has a really pretty white ruffle across the top & bottom

This corset is double layered  inside is White & Black polka dots material 

The back of this corset closes with white lace hook & eye tape

has a sexy,Lolita, Girly look

Measurements are Bust Is 36" B C CUP Waiste is 30 1/2" Hips are 34"

This will fit slightly smaller And maybe 1/2 inch bigger on each measurement

All seam are serged to prevent fraying

and top stitched to make the corset more durable

**This is a beautiful top **

Pictures do no justice
